title: Get rid of low priority, seriously.
body: When I was playing a blind pick match a while ago, I had to go do something 10 minutes into the match. I came back, and continued playing the match. After that, Riot gave me yet another 5 low priority matches. I feel really disappointed about this and I feel like this needs to stop.

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you'd only get a 5-match LPQ if you've exhibited a trend of disconnecting. We understand that sometimes emergencies happen and you **need** to take off to take care of something. 

If you're experiencing technical issues that caused you to disconnect from matches, please let me know so we can work together to resolve it.
Do dodges count the same as disconnections or afking?

Dodges are treated by a slightly different system than Leaverbuster, which addresses players who go AFK or disconnect from a match. You can read about Queue Dodging in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

You don't get low priority queues for just one game and it takes a pattern of afks to get it.  The system can feel harsh but it isn't fun for players who have to play with someone who is leaves or afks games.
